title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Foreign Language Network Learning Design Using AI: A Connectivist Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate foreign language proficiency and basic digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Independently design and implement three customized foreign language content pieces using AI-based language tools
Share information and exchange feedback at least five times with peer learners and AI nodes following connectivist network learning principles
Improve and present foreign language project outputs (e.g., presentation materials, essays) using generative AI tools at least twice
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
